name: Kirby no Omochabako: Cannonball
overview: Kirby no Omochabako: Cannonball is the one of the Kirby no Omochabako (Kirby's Toy Box) minigames for the Super Famicom's Japan-only Satellaview service. The player controls a giant robotic Rick aimed at destroying another giant robotic Rick, using Kirbys as ammunition. Similar to the Worms franchise, there is terrain which can be destroyed in a way that can help the player (i.e. by giving them more space to fire).
